config.rename_image_to_preserve_order (help): if true, prefix “00X_” will be added to the beginning of image name, where X is the index of link in your text file and 00 - leading zeros depending on number of links in the file
config.normalize_image_name (help): if true, string slugification will be perform. A "slug" is a way of generating a valid URL. Learn more here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5574042/string-slugification-in-python
